Our Team

Meet The People Behind Apexure

WASEEM BASHIR

FOUNDER & CEO

Before founding Apexure, Waseem worked in London’s Financial Industry. He has worked on trading floors in BNP Paribas and Trafigura, developing complex business systems. Waseem loves working with Startups and combines data and design to create improved User Experiences..
